channel.title: Game Tutorials on Godot 3 Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Game Tutorials on Godot 3 Recipes

item.title: Mobile Game: Circle Jump
item.description: Circle Jump An end-to-end game development series. In this series, we build a one-touch mobile game called “Circle Jump”. Here’s what the game looks like: In each part of the series, we’ll add features and fix bugs, explaining the process along the way. The game is be available on the following platforms: Android: Google Play Store iOS: coming soon Web: Game of the Month You can also download it for desktop platforms from Itch.
